attributes.action: lower our income tax due to lack of confidence as to how our tax is being spent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people have told me that they are not happy with how much tax they are paying and now we have seen how our MPs have abused the tax payer’s money not only in expenses but other things, I would urge all who do not like where our hard earned money is going to sign this petition.
